description: Corporate team building race for downtown office areas (2-3 hours)

clues.title: Coffee Quest Start
content: Welcome to your Corporate Adventure Race!
Start at the main lobby of your office building.
Find the company mission statement display.
Take a team photo with the mission statement clearly visible in the background.
Each team member must be making a different gesture or pose.

detourOptionA.title: Lunch Rush
detourOptionA.description: Visit 3 different food trucks or quick-service restaurants within a 4-block radius. Order one item from each (team's choice). Take a photo of each food item with the vendor/restaurant name visible. Get receipts with timestamps to prove you visited all three. All visits must be completed within 45 minutes.

detourOptionB.title: Network Dash
detourOptionB.description: Find and take professional photos with 5 people who work at different companies in nearby office buildings. Each person must be wearing a visible company badge, lanyard, or branded clothing. Get their business cards or LinkedIn connections. Take a group selfie with each person and a photo of their business card.

clues.title: Public Speaking Challenge
clues.roadblockQuestion: Who's ready to address the crowd?
clues.roadblockTask: Go to the nearest public space with foot traffic (plaza, park, coffee shop). Give a 2-minute impromptu speech about why your company is awesome to at least 3 strangers. Get their business cards, phone numbers, or LinkedIn connections to prove they listened. Take a photo of yourself mid-speech with the audience visible, and collect evidence of your 3 connections.

clues.title: Local Business Appreciation
content: Find a small, locally-owned business (not a chain) within 3 blocks.
Purchase something small from the business (under $20 total for the team).
Interview the owner or manager about what makes their business special.
Take a team photo with the owner/manager, your purchase, and the business storefront.
Get a receipt and the business owner's contact information.

detourOptionA.title: Tech Hunt
detourOptionA.description: Find examples of 5 different types of technology being used in the public spaces around you (digital billboards, QR codes, payment terminals, security cameras, charging stations, etc.). Take photos of each technology with a team member interacting with or pointing to it. Create a short video explaining how each technology makes city life better.

detourOptionB.title: Art Walk
detourOptionB.description: Find 5 different pieces of public art (murals, sculptures, installations, interesting architecture). Take creative team photos with each piece where you're mimicking the art style or interacting with it. Write a one-sentence description of each artwork. Take a creative group video presenting your 'art gallery tour' to the camera.

clues.title: Social Media Mastery
clues.roadblockQuestion: Who's the most social media savvy?
clues.roadblockTask: Create and post a professional LinkedIn post about your team building experience that includes: a team photo from today's race, mentions of at least 2 local businesses you've visited, 3 relevant hashtags, and tags your company's official LinkedIn page. The post must get at least 5 likes or comments from your network within 30 minutes. Screenshot the post and engagement metrics as proof.

clues.title: Community Connection Finish
content: For your final challenge, give back to the community!
Find a way to help someone or make the neighborhood better.
Examples: help someone with directions, pick up litter, leave a positive review for a local business, help someone carry groceries, etc.
Document your good deed with photos and a brief explanation.
Return to the office lobby for your finish line celebration!
Take a final team photo showing what you accomplished together today.
